seo.title: Moizayo | Healing Gatherings for Professionals
seo.description: Light after-work healing meetups. Recover gently, close to home.

badge.context: A place to rest after work

hero.subtitle: Walks, meditation, board games and craft studios. Light healing meetups for busy professionals open every day—near your neighborhood and after work hours, comfortable even for the shy.

grid.caption: New healing meetups are updated today ✨

features.title: A just-right flow for professionals
features.lead: A light 2–3 hour routine after work. It’s okay to come alone or be shy.

match.title: Hobbies, mental health, skill-up activities
match.desc: In the Dallaemfit category, you can enjoy active activities such as hobbies and sports and take care of mental health, and Self-development meetings are held in the Workation category!

smallSafe.title: Small & safe atmosphere
smallSafe.desc: 5–10 people per group and host verification keep it comfortable for newcomers.

wellbeing.title: Member well-being care
wellbeing.desc: Guides to avoid over-immersion, noise and conflict help everyone rest.

one.title: Pick interests
one.desc: Choose keywords like walks, meditation, board games or crafts,

two.title: Choose time/area
two.desc: Filter by after-work time and distance to see only what fits,

three.title: Join & review
three.desc: Join lightly and leave an honest review.

one.title: After-work burnout eased a lot
one.body: Short meditation and a walk cleared my head; I could blend in without awkwardness.

two.title: A hobby I wouldn’t try alone
two.body: Going to a candle workshop together felt easy. Next I signed up for knitting.

three.title: Comfortable despite being shy
three.body: The small size and gentle flow let me keep my own pace.

ctaBanner.title: Shall we make a plan to rest tonight?
ctaBanner.desc: Moizayo aims for everyday, unexaggerated healing. Keep it light, close to home.

one.q: Will it feel awkward for first timers?
one.a: Most participants are first timers; the flow is gentle and ice-breaking is low-pressure.

two.a: Host verification, review checks and reporting. Group size limits prevent crowding.

three.a: It varies by gathering, but we avoid heavy commercialism and announce fees transparently.

signin.title: Sign In Page
signin.desc1: Take a break from your busy daily life,

header.subtitle: Don't have anyone to join with?
header.title: Join a gathering now
